name: SendPurchaseOrderEmail
description:
Send a purchase order email to the vendor.

Use this tool to email a purchase order to the vendor. If no custom content is provided, the email will be sent with default content.

parameters.name: organization_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the organization. Required to specify which organization the purchase order belongs to.

parameters.name: purchase_order_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the purchase order to be emailed to the vendor.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the purchase order.

parameters.name: email_attachments
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of file paths or URLs to attach to the email.

value_schema.description: The files to be attached with the email.

parameters.name: attachment_file_name
parameters.description: The name of the file to attach to the email for the purchase order.

parameters.name: email_custom_content
parameters.description: Custom email details like subject, body, and recipient lists in a JSON format. This includes 'send_from_org_email_id', 'from_address_id', 'to_mail_ids', 'cc_mail_ids', 'bcc_mail_ids', 'subject', 'body', and 'mail_documents'.

send_from_org_email_id.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address.

from_address_id.description: ID of From Address of the Email Address

to_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

cc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be cced.

bcc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be BCC ed.

file_name.description: Name of the attached document file. Includes file extension and represents the original filename as uploaded. Used for display purposes and file identification in the system.

parameters.name: send_purchase_order_attachment
parameters.description: Set to true to include the purchase order as an attachment with the email.

value_schema.description: Send the purchase order attachment a with the email.
